field.name: id
field.comment: ID

field.name: creditor_id
field.title: Creditor Contact ID
field.comment: FK to Contact ID that owns that account

field.name: identifier
field.title: SEPA Creditor identifier
field.comment: Provided by the bank. ISO country code+check digit+ZZZ+country specific identifier

field.name: name
field.title: Creditor Name
field.comment: official creditor name, passed to exported files

field.name: label
field.title: Creditor Label
field.comment: internally used label for the creditor

field.name: address
field.title: Address of the creditor
field.comment: by default creditor_id.address (billing) at creation

field.name: country_id
field.title: Country
field.comment: Which Country does this address belong to.

field.name: iban
field.comment: Iban of the creditor

field.name: bic
field.comment: BIC of the creditor

field.name: mandate_prefix
field.title: Mandate numering prefix
field.comment: prefix for mandate identifiers

field.name: currency
field.comment: currency used by this creditor

field.name: payment_processor_id
field.comment: Payment processor link (to be deprecated)

field.name: category
field.title: Category purpose of the collection
field.comment: Default value

field.name: tag
field.comment: Place this creditor's transaction groups in an XML file tagged with this value.

field.name: mandate_active
field.title: Immediately activate new Mandates
field.comment: If true, new Mandates for this Creditor are set to active directly upon creation; otherwise, they have to be activated explicitly later on.

field.name: sepa_file_format_id
field.title: SEPA File Format
field.comment: Variant of the pain.008 format to use when generating SEPA XML files for this creditor. FK to SEPA File Formats in civicrm_option_value.

field.name: creditor_type
field.title: Creditor Type
field.comment: Type of the creditor, values are SEPA (default) and PSP

field.name: pi_ooff
field.title: OOFF Payment Instruments
field.comment: Payment instruments, comma separated, to be used for one-off collections

field.name: pi_rcur
field.title: RCUR Payment Instruments
field.comment: Payment instruments, comma separated, to be used for recurring collections

field.name: uses_bic
field.title: Immediately activate new Mandates
field.comment: If true, BICs are not used for this creditor

field.name: cuc
field.title: CUC
field.comment: CUC of the creditor
